title: Lava effusion, lava flow observed in Mayon Volcano - PHIVOLCS
desc: There was lava effusion with lava flow observed in Mayon Volcano on the Basud, Bonga, and Misi gullies within the past 24 hours, the Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology (PHIVOLCS) reported.

title: Can a Mammogram Detect Heart Disease? The Science Behind a Surprising New Discovery
desc: Two new studies suggest that routine mammograms could help detect heart disease based on breast arterial calcification (BAC). Experts explain the connection.

title: Homeless mother refused social housing after Centrelink payments deemed too high
desc: Welfare payments are Rissa Blakely's only source of income, but she and her kids have been left with no choice but to live in a park.

title: Where Trump sees big 'ugly' windmills, Canada sees opportunity
desc: U.S. President Trump calls wind power projects "ugly losers," and it's putting a deep chill on investments. But Canada stands to benefit as wind companies consider new prospects off the East Coast.
